messages.message: Strongly declared an intention to march into Galicia. I think the hedgehog is the most popular Austrian opening, so I don’t know why Russia would make that obvious play. I hope Italy isn’t trying to navigate a juggernaut by hitting me. That’s a sure fire way for Italy to lose. I collapse, Turkey gets a navy, France gets bored and pushes the med to stop turkey, and Italy gets trapped in the middle.

messages.message:
Regarding Germany and Russia:
France getting 3 centers in 1901 and building that many fleets means it’ll be hard for you to work with him in the long-term. Also, Russia is planning on moving into the Carpathians and Hungary, and Turkey‘s build, in my opinion, can only mean that Turkey is not concerned with Russia, because Turkey’s right flank is now completely exposed.
If you can provide token assistance to Germany and hold Irish and the channel, then you can probably convoy to the north and push on Russia up there while most of Russia’s units fight with me. I think this is in our best interests because France dominating the seas isn’t compatible with England in the long run, and a Turkey Russia alliance is quite difficult to stop.
messages.input:
My response to ENGLAND:'Regarding Germany and Russia:
France getting 3 centers in 1901 and building that many fleets means it’ll be hard for you to work with him in the long-term. Also, Russia is planning on moving into the Carpathians and Hungary, and Turkey‘s build, in my opinion, can only mean that Turkey is not concerned with Russia, because Turkey’s right flank is now completely exposed.
If you can provide token assistance to Germany and hold Irish and the channel, then you can probably convoy to the north and push on Russia up there while most of Russia’s units fight with me. I think this is in our best interests because France dominating the seas isn’t compatible with England in the long run, and a Turkey Russia alliance is quite difficult to stop.'.
